summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Municipal Light and Power Plant and System; authorizing an agreement with the United States of America, Department of the Interior acting by and through the Bonneville Power Administrator and with the Washington Public Power Supply System, providing for the purchase by the City of a portion of the electric power output of Nuclear Project No. 1 to be constructed in conjunction with the existing Hanford New Production Reactor and an exchange of power in connection therewith; and also approving execution by the Administrator of an Agreement providing for disposition of Hanford New Production Reactor energy for 1974-1975.
